item.title: What's wrong with this?
item.dc:creator: @tythus tythus
item.description:
@tythus wrote:

case 8987: if(objectX == 2741 && objectY == 3474) { teleportToX = 2525; teleportToY = 4783; sendMessage("Welcome to the '~Guessing Mini-Game~' where you can earn 2.1B of 1 type of Rare Item... Or get a worthless one."); sendMessage("To play, just click on a Portal each round and if you get it wrong, you go Home..."); sendMessage("But if you get it right, you go to the next round. Theres 10 rounds, the prizes get bigger each round."); sendMessage("So, let the games begin!"); } else if(objectX == 2525 && objectY == 4784) { sendMessage("Welcome to the 2nd Round."); sendMessage("Please have this Reward for winning the 1st round."); } else if(objectX == 2526 && objectY == 4783) { teleportToX = 2991; teleportToY = 3383; sendMessage("Sorry, you chose the wrong portal, better luck next time!"); } else if(objectX == 2524 && objectY == 4783) { teleportToX = 2991; teleportToY = 3383; sendMessage("Sorry, you chose the wrong portal, better luck next time!"); } else if(objectX == 2525 && object Y == 4782) { teleportToX = 2991; teleportToY = 3383; sendMessage("Sorry, you chose the wrong portal, better luck next time!"); } else if(objectX == 2991 && objectY == 3381) { teleportToX = 2525; teleportToY = 4783; sendMessage("Good luck... again."); } else if(objectX == 2991 && objectY == 3386) { teleportToX = 2738; teleportToY = 3473; sendMessage("Quitter!!! Well... Unless you got a big prize."); } } break;
Try This…

Read full topic

item.title: What's wrong with this?
item.dc:creator: @tythus tythus
item.description:
@tythus wrote:

Could This Help

case 8987: if(objectX == 2741 && objectY == 3474) { teleportToX = 2525; teleportToY = 4783; sendMessage("Welcome to the '~Guessing Mini-Game~' where you can earn 2.1B of 1 type of Rare Item... Or get a worthless one."); sendMessage("To play, just click on a Portal each round and if you get it wrong, you go Home..."); sendMessage("But if you get it right, you go to the next round. Theres 10 rounds, the prizes get bigger each round."); sendMessage("So, let the games begin!"); } else if(objectX == 2525 && objectY == 4784) { sendMessage("Welcome to the 2nd Round."); sendMessage("Please have this Reward for winning the 1st round."); } else if(objectX == 2526 && objectY == 4783) { teleportToX = 2991; teleportToY = 3383; sendMessage("Sorry, you chose the wrong portal, better luck next time!"); } else if(objectX == 2524 && objectY == 4783) { teleportToX = 2991; teleportToY = 3383; sendMessage("Sorry, you chose the wrong portal, better luck next time!"); } else if(objectX == 2525 && object Y == 4782) { teleportToX = 2991; teleportToY = 3383; sendMessage("Sorry, you chose the wrong portal, better luck next time!"); } else if(objectX == 2991 && objectY == 3381) { teleportToX = 2525; teleportToY = 4783; sendMessage("Good luck... again."); } else if(objectX == 2991 && objectY == 3386) { teleportToX = 2738; teleportToY = 3473; sendMessage("Quitter!!! Well... Unless you got a big prize."); } break;

Try This And Tell me If It Works Or Not…

item.title: What's wrong with this?
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

case 8987: if(objectX == 2741 && objectY == 3474) { teleportToX = 2525; teleportToY = 4783; sendMessage("Welcome to the '~Guessing Mini-Game~' where you can earn 2.1B of 1 type of Rare Item... Or get a worthless one."); sendMessage("To play, just click on a Portal each round and if you get it wrong, you go Home..."); sendMessage("But if you get it right, you go to the next round. Theres 10 rounds, the prizes get bigger each round."); sendMessage("So, let the games begin!"); } else if(objectX == 2525 && objectY == 4784) { // Winner sendMessage("Welcome to the 2nd Round."); sendMessage("Please have this Reward for winning the 1st round."); // Winner } else if(objectX == 2526 && objectY == 4783) { teleportToX = 2991; teleportToY = 3383; sendMessage("Sorry, you chose the wrong portal, better luck next time!"); } else if(objectX == 2524 && objectY == 4783) { teleportToX = 2991; teleportToY = 3383; sendMessage("Sorry, you chose the wrong portal, better luck next time!"); } else if(objectX == 2525 && object Y == 4782) { teleportToX = 2991; teleportToY = 3383; sendMessage("Sorry, you chose the wrong portal, better luck next time!"); } else if(objectX == 2991 && objectY == 3381) { teleportToX = 2525; teleportToY = 4783; sendMessage("Good luck... again."); } else if(objectX == 2991 && objectY == 3386) { teleportToX = 2738; teleportToY = 3473; sendMessage("Quitter!!! Well... Unless you got a big prize. :)"); } break;

That is for a new minigame I’m trying to make, but when I try to Compile it says:

case, default, or '}' expected

Read full topic
